definitions.example: There's a lot of admin involved in the birth of a child.

definitions.definition: A systems administrator; one who maintains a computer system or network.
definitions.example: Our admin has upgraded the server in our office, so we can exchange files faster.

definitions.definition: A user of a discussion forum, web site, etc. with privileges allowing them to control or restrict the activity of other uses.
definitions.example: The admin changed the forum settings to enable the use of emoticons.

definitions.definition: To serve as an administrator for or of.
